titleStmt.title: Tvvo speeches, spoken in the honourable House of Commons. The first by Mr. Grimston Esquire: the second, by Sir Beniamin Rudiard. Concerning the differences between the Kings Majesty, and both Houses of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Grimston, Harbottle, Sir, 1603-1685.
Rudyerd, Benjamin, Sir, 1572-1658.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
